Wraithwater

From Walkscape Walkthrough

Namespaces

  • Page
  • Discussion

More

  • More

Page actions

  • Purge
This page contains changes which are not marked for translation.

An old drowned town once taken over by pirates from the haunted citizens, who have now also passed into their own ghastly state. Their presence has filled the area with ectoplasm.

Wraithwater is a location that can be found in the Wallisia region.

Keyword

The following keywords apply to this location.

Spectral

Faction

Wraithwater is a member of the following factions:

Wallisia

Activities

The following activities always available at this location.

Ghost tag
Ectoplasm fishing
Graveyard foraging
Mine ectoplasm rocks
Cut ectoplasm trees

Hidden Activity

These Hidden Activities are only visible if you meet the requirements first.

Repair the bank

Buildings

The following buildings can be visited at this location.

General store
Lost Soulsourcing
Bank
Broken Spirit Savings
Bank
Restored Spirit Savings

Services

The following services can be used at this location.

Cursed Sawmill (Advanced)
Cursed Forge (Advanced)
Cursed Kitchen (Advanced)
Cursed Workshop (Advanced)
Wardrobe

Routes

The following routes are available at this location.

  Tendon Wet Fields 
1313 Base Steps
 Wraithwater 
  Stalking Yew Woods 
441 Base Steps1
  1. Have item Charter of the drowned with you.
